name: Portrait Photography
description: Portrait photography is about capturing the essence, personality, identity and attitude of a person utilizing backgrounds, lighting and posing.

name: Nature Photography
description: When words become unclear, I shall focus with photographs. When images become inadequate, I shall be content with silence.Nature never goes out of style.

name: Stock Photos
description: High-quality photos that are already created and made available for licensing, to use in multiple creative ways
